Real Madrid's loan for Bernabeu's renovation is counted separately from the regular annual budgets and the money from the US bank cannot be used for anything other than the stadium construction. [ @Marca ]

Former Tottenham boss Mauricio Pochettino and current Real Madrid reserve team boss Raul are contenders to take over at the Spanish giants if they decide to sack Zinedine Zidane.

Clasico result could be crucial

Zinedine Zidane is facing the axe at Real Madrid if his side's fortunes don't improve in their next two games, reports l'Equipe.
